attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we would like to see parliament dissolved with immediate effect,as parliament and politicians have become fatally discredited, not just parliamentarians,we would like moves to bring in proportional representation, to make things fairer for the smaller parties, and crimminal proceeding brought against all of parliaments offenders.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
